tool_description: Manages directory metadata including custom attributes, tags, descriptions, and creation timestamps with support for bulk operations and metadata inheritance.

directory_paths.description: List of directory paths to manage metadata for

metadata_operation.description: Operation type: set, get, update, delete, inherit

attributes.description: Custom attribute key-value pairs in format key=value

tags.description: List of tags to associate with directories

inherit_from_parent.description: Whether to inherit metadata from parent directory

metadata_format.description: Storage format: json, xml, yaml, properties

error_messages: Invalid operation: Use one of [set, get, update, delete, inherit] for metadata_operation.
Directory not found: One or more specified directories do not exist.
Invalid metadata format: Use one of [json, xml, yaml, properties] for metadata_format.
Malformed attributes: Attributes must be in key=value format.
Permission denied: Insufficient permissions to modify directory metadata.
Parent metadata missing: Cannot inherit metadata when parent directory has no metadata.
usage: Specify directory_paths and metadata_operation, then provide relevant metadata fields like attributes, tags, or description. The tool manages metadata according to the specified operation.

processed_directories.description: List of directories where metadata operations were successful

metadata_records.description: Retrieved or updated metadata records in specified format

operation_status.description: Overall status of the metadata operation
